mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event(num, title, content, evt_date, exp_date, photo) VALUES ( event_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{evt_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{exp_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT photo_path FROM event WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT_REQUEST (er_num, num, memberIdx, reg_date) VALUES (EVENTREQUEST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{memberidx}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT m1.name, m1.memberIdx FROM EVENT_REQUEST er JOIN member1 m1 ON m1.memberIdx = er.memberIdx WHERE er.num = #{num}
